mapper.inputBody:
{
    "includeWebResults": false,
    "language": "en",
    "leadsEnrichmentDepartments": [
        "c_suite"
    ],
    "locationQuery": "{{1.Location}}",
    "maxReviews": 0,
    "maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch": 2,
    "maximumLeadsEnrichmentRecords": 0,
    "reviewsSort": "highestRanking",
    "scrapeContacts": true,
    "scrapeDirectories": false,
    "scrapeImageAuthors": false,
    "scrapePlaceDetailPage": true,
    "scrapeReviewsPersonalData": true,
    "scrapeTableReservationProvider": false,
    "searchStringsArray": [
        "{{1.Industry}} companies in {{1.Location}}"
    ],
    "skipClosedPlaces": true,
    "website": "withWebsite"
}

{
    "focusOnPaidAds": true,
    "forceExactMatch": false,
    "includeIcons": false,
    "includeUnfilteredResults": false,
    "maxPagesPerQuery": 1,
    "mobileResults": false,
    "queries": "{{5.title}} site:linkedin.com",
    "resultsPerPage": 1,
    "saveHtml": false,
    "saveHtmlToKeyValueStore": true
}

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays
